description:
Party on, change your very own Nintendo DSi into a discolight.

Choose between several music genres such as Love, Hip Hop, Rock etc. As a special feature the Nintendo DSi makes use of the "Disco Disco" functionality of Discolight. The Nintendo DSi will then shine to the rhythm of the music that you are currently listening too.

Add several Nintendo DSi together and create your very own disco!
name: Discolight
